title: Social Media-Based Blended Learning Design for Advanced Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematical concepts and experience using LMS systems
context.additional_context: Establishing flexible learning environments for working adult learners, dissolving boundaries between formal and informal learning.

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively analyze mathematical problem-solving processes using social media tools
Learners can create content explaining mathematical concepts on blogs/formats integrated with an LMS
Learners engage in mathematical discussions and exchange feedback on real-time platforms such as Twitter/Discord
Learners can propose blended learning strategies based on social media-based learning experiences

resources: Social Media Accounts (Twitter, Discord, Blog, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
